name: Destruction Blaster
description:
A game I made in Unity, in a Game Programming Class at my University.

Move around, find a coin, buy a gun, then shoot all of the destructible objects! There are 30 items total, consisting of vases, bird baths, wooden benches, and stone benches. Use R to reload. Z reloads the game. M to mute the music.

Some of the things I learned from this project:

  • NavMesh
  • Colliders
  • Accessor/Modifier methods
  • Raycasting
  • Destructibles
  • Particle effects

Hope you enjoy!
